forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 11C. ENE winds shifting to NW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 53F. ENE winds shifting to NW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.
